tag_list: entrepreneur, technology, startup, public-relations, san-francisco, silicon-valley, media, pr
overview:
Steve is the Director of Technology and Digital Content for MWW, and heads the firm’s Silicon Valley-based MWW Ventures practice. Steve directs client development, digital and traditional media strategy and new business and partnership initiatives.

Steve is recognized as a top up-and-coming public relations, communications and digital media strategist. His professional experience spans from Silicon Valley startups to global technology, retail and non-profit organizations.

As a founding member and adviser for the Kairos Society, one of the world’s most recognized entrepreneurial organizations, Steve has long championed international entrepreneurism and has worked with dozens of early stage CEOs.

Steve is a NCAA Division-l athlete, and a two-time national champion ice hockey player.

milestones.description: Director, Technology & Digital Content, MWW Ventures, Strategic Partnerships
milestones.source_description: Steve Mnich Joins MWW As Director In Agency's San Francisco Office
